title: Pregnant woman, toddler fatally shot in Idaho, sheriff says
description: Authorities say a 33-year-old pregnant woman and her toddler son have been found dead in a home in northern Idaho

title: Debt ceiling talks will resume after 'pause'
description: After a day of stalled negotiations, House Speaker Kevin McCarthy said that negotiators will be "back in the room tonight" to continue working on a debt deal.

title: United States returns 'Earth Monster' Olmec sculpture to Mexico
description: Mexico says a huge 2,500-year-old Olmec stone sculpture has been returned by the United States

title: Microsoft says China approves its plan to buy video game-maker Activision Blizzard
description: Microsoft said Friday that China has unconditionally approved its plan to buy video game company Activision Blizzard even as the deal still faces antitrust opposition in the U.S. and United Kingdom

title: Wisconsin man charged with hacking sports betting accounts
description: A Wisconsin man is charged in a plot to hack and steal from thousands of sports betting accounts

title: Key sticking points, possible areas of compromise in the debt ceiling showdown
description: High-stakes negotiations on the debt ceiling abruptly stalled Friday after incremental glimmers of progress.

title: Jim Brown, legendary running back and civil rights activist, dead at 87
description: Jim Brown was elected to the Pro Football Hall of Fame in 1971.

title: Target recalls millions of candles due to laceration, burn hazards
description: The United States Consumer Product Safety Commission announced the recall of Target Threshold candle products after reports of breaking or cracking during use.

title: At graduations, Native American students seek acceptance of tribal regalia
description: Tribal regalia is often passed down through generations and worn at graduations.

title: Police search for inmate who escaped through car window then kidnapped 2
description: Louisville police are searching for 31-year-old Norman Wolfe, who escaped through the back window of a police car Thursday.

title: Sen. Tim Scott makes it official: He's a Republican candidate for president
description: Sen. Tim Scott of South Carolina made it official Friday: He's running for president

title: Debt ceiling talks on 'pause,' McCarthy's top negotiator says
description: "We decided to press pause because it's just not productive," Rep. Garrett Graves said as he emerged from a meeting with White House negotiators.

title: Arrest made nearly 4 years after abandoned baby found alive in plastic bag
description: Nearly four years after an abandoned newborn was found alive in a plastic bag in Georgia, an arrest has been made in the case, authorities announced.

title: Brittney Griner set for first WNBA game since detainment in Russia
description: Brittney Griner and the Phoenix Mercury visit the Los Angeles Sparks as part of a four-game slate on the first day of the WNBA season

title: Hundreds of thousands displaced following historic floods in Somalia
description: At least 22 people have been killed, according to the United Nations.

title: Jimmy Buffett postpones concert amid hospitalization
description: Jimmy Buffett postponed a concert in Charleston, South Carolina, after he was hospitalized to "address some issues that needed immediate attention."

title: Iran executes 3 protesters despite international outcry
description: Iran said it executed three men Friday morning on charges of "waging war against God" and collaboration with terrorist groups.

title: DC police lieutenant charged with obstruction in Proud Boys probe
description: Prosecutors say he leaked information to then-Proud Boys leader Enrique Tarrio.

title: British climber scales Everest for 17th time, the most by a non-Sherpa guide
description: A British mountain guide has returned to Nepal’s capital after scaling Mount Everest for a 17th time, breaking his own record for the most ascents of the world’s highest mountain by a non-Sherpa guide

title: Target recalls nearly 5 million Threshold candles after severe burns, lacerations reported
description: Target is recalling almost 5 million candles over laceration and burn hazards, according to a Thursday notice from the U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission

title: Prosecutor suggests any indictments in Trump election investigation would likely come in August
description: The Atlanta prosecutor suggested any indictments would likely come in August.

title: Bass guitarist Andy Rourke of The Smiths dies at 59
description: Andy Rourke, bass guitarist of The Smiths, one of the most influential British bands of the 1980s, has died after a lengthy illness with pancreatic cancer, his former bandmate Johnny Marr said Friday

title: Targeted shooting at Ohio engine facility leaves 1 dead and one injured
description: A targeted shooting in an Ohio engine factory left one dead and one injured late Thursday night.

title: Shooting at Ohio auto plant kills 1, sends 2nd victim and alleged gunman to hospital
description: Police in Ohio say a man was killed and a second victim was wounded in a shooting at an auto plant Thursday night

title: Detention hearing set for Pentagon leak suspect Jack Teixeira
description: The detention hearing for Jack Teixeira, the 21-year-old airman charged in connection with the leaked documents probe, is set to continue Friday.

title: Atomic bomb survivors look to G7 as a 'sliver of hope' for nuclear disarmament
description: Holding this week’s Group of Seven summit in Hiroshima, the site of the world’s first atomic bomb attack, is an attempt by Prime Minister Fumio Kishida to promote an anti-nuclear message

title: Minor earthquake shakes residents near New York City
description: A 2.2 magnitude impacted the New York metro area around 1:50 a.m., according to the United States Geological Service.

title: Australian police Taser 95-year-old with dementia as she approached them with knife
description: A 95-year-old woman was in critical condition Friday, two days after police shocked her with a stun gun as she approached them with a walking frame and a steak knife in an Australian nursing home

title: Zelenskyy to attend G7 summit in Japan in person Sunday as leaders
description: Ukrainian official: Zelenskyy to attend G7 summit in Japan in person Sunday as leaders set new Russia sanctions

title: 7.7 magnitude earthquake shakes far Pacific
description: A 7.7 magnitude earthquake Friday in the far Pacific posed a tsunami threat for Vanuatu

title: WATCH:  Officer clings to car during police chase
description: Dramatic footage recently released by police in Iowa shows an officer clinging to the hood of a car after the driver decided to take off during a traffic stop in March 2021.

title: 7 dead in vehicle crash on interstate in Oregon
description: Oregon State Police say seven people are dead and others were hurt in a crash involving multiple vehicles on Interstate 5 near Albany
